name: Wonderful Weather
tagline: Weather forecasts and observations wrapped in an award-winning user experience tailored to your location.
body:
###Features
* Current weather conditions and observations 
* National radar 
* Satellite visualizations 
* Hourly and 8-day forecasts
* Global weather forecast animations of temperature, precipitation, surface winds, and relative humidity

Your local weather conditions update hourly andÂ eight day forecasts are automatically generated as new weather information is gathered and processed.   Plan your afternoon, your day, and your week with confidence using the Wonderful Weather app.

![0x0ss](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5067214/11905462/3b2133a2-a58c-11e5-8a9e-d01970705ad4.jpg)


### Authors and Contributors
Bill Chapman, Bliss Chapman, & Justin Loew

### Support or Contact
Email us with questions, comments, feature requests, puns, or great jokes at bliss.chapman@gmail.com
